author: hola.com
title: A‚Äôja Wilson Wears Exclusive Nike LeBron ‚ÄòAlpha Kappa Alpha‚Äô Shoes ‚Äì Footwear News
text:
A‚Äôja Wilson is a frontrunner to take home this season‚Äôs WNBA MVP honor ‚Äî the award would be her third after winning it in 2020 and 2022 ‚Äî and she‚Äôs doing so in style. Wilson‚Äôs performance during the Las Vegas Aces‚Äô game against the Atlanta Dream on Friday, August 30 is a perfect example of her ability to take over the court and look good while doing it.
For the Friday match-up, Wilson wore a special version of LeBron James‚Äô Nike LeBron 21 sneaker in a player exclusive colorway. Wilson‚Äôs PE was inspired by her sorority, Alpha Kappa Alpha, which she joined while attending the University of South Carolina.
With a mostly black upper, Wilson‚Äôs Alpha Kappa Alpha-inspired LeBron 21 PEs added accents of the sorority‚Äôs colors, salmon pink and apple green. Salmon pink filled the shoe‚Äôs Swoosh and Air Zoom-cushioned midsole, while the apple green color was more subtly used on the eyelets, tongue logo and the heel‚Äôs detailing. Understated yet elegant, the exclusive pair didn‚Äôt appear to feature any official Alpha Kappa Alpha branding, but the colors were enough to tell the story.
A‚Äôja Wilson (left) guards Laeticia Amihere of the Atlanta Dream during an August 30 game. Credit: Getty
Alpha Kappa Alpha was founded at Howard University in 1908 and is recognized as the first intercollegiate historically Black sorority. It boasts a number of notable members, among them is presidential nominee Kamala Harris. Wilson and Harris shared a sorority-related moment together in August 2023 during the Aces‚Äô visit to the White House after winning the ‚Äô22 WNBA championship.
@wnba VP, Kamala Harris, had to drop @A‚Äôja Wilson some #AKA love real quick at the @Las Vegas Aces White House visit üíöü©∑ #wnba #whitehousevisit
‚ô¨ original sound ‚Äì WNBA
Wilson attended the University of South Carolina from 2014 to 2018, where she was a member of AKA‚Äôs Theta Gamma chapter. She earned numerous SEC accolades in college before being drafted first overall by the Aces in the 2018 WNBA Draft.
Her WNBA career has been illustrious, with many regarding her as a top active player today. In addition to her aforementioned MVP honors, she led the Aces to WNBA championships in ‚Äô22 and ‚Äô23. In the summer of 2024, Wilson propelled the US women‚Äôs Olympic basketball team to their eighth straight gold medal.
Wilson‚Äôs debut signature sneaker, the Nike A‚ÄôOne , will be released in 2025.
Despite pleas from fans on social media, it‚Äôs unlikely Wilson‚Äôs Nike LeBron 21 ‚ÄúAlpha Kappa Alpha‚Äù PE will be released to the public. Fans can find other LeBron 21 styles on nike.com from $99.97.
A‚Äôja Wilson celebrates in her Nike LeBron 21 PE. Credit: Getty
A‚Äôja Wilson shoots in her Alpha Kappa Alpha-inspired Nike LeBron 21 PE. Credit: Getty
